document_data.name: Baelaetha Baergil
document_data.mainbody: '''Baelaetha Baergil''' (? â€“ 1337 DR) was a farmer's wife who lived near to [[Ashabenford]], [[Mistledale]]. She was the mother of famous Captain [[Darrask Baergil]] of the [[Riders of Mistledale]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2011)/Captain Baergil}}
document_data.Relatives: Baelaetha was married to [[Angram Baergil]], and they had seven children: three boys and four girls. Her first two sons were [[Athror Baergil]] and Captain Darrask Baergil.
